These functions take a result of 3-way comparison and convert it to the result of one of the six relational operators

Specifically, these functions return
@1@ {{c|1=cmp == 0}}
@2@ {{c|1=cmp != 0}}
@3@ {{c|1=cmp &lt; 0}}
@4@ {{c|1=cmp &lt;= 0}}
@5@ {{c|1=cmp &gt; 0}}
@6@ {{c|1=cmp &gt;= 0}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | cmp | result of 3-way comparison}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|bool}} result of the corresponding relational operation
